website_summaries.verdict: Only a little heavier than 500-lumen LED-based portable projectors but a lot brighter, the Optoma X304M delivers a bright image in a highly portable package.
pros: Good to excellent data image quality
cons: Video is suitable for only short clips

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy the carrying case
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic projector. Amazing that such a small projector can pack such a bright punch. Image quality is very sharp. Easy to set up. Only one regret: we purchased the BK-4021 carrying case because the projector description did not mention a case (see "What's in the box?"). Well, it DOES COME WITH A CASE. So, save your money and the return shipping fees. Hoping Amazon will see this and correct the product description.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Picky

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace my previous Optoma projector I had for over 8 years. I performed quite a bit of research prior to choosing this projector. I like the small footprint and great projection. I am a professional trainer and use this in a variety of rooms. This works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Congress

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: We do a couple dozen programs a year in a couple dozen locations. This projector is half the size of our last. Sets up in a hurry and offers a really bright vivid image.
customer_reviews.author: HackManDo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Projector
customer_reviews.text: I use this with either my tablet or my PC. It is a perfect projector for my needs. I conduct classes all over the world and this makes my life much easier. Compact and light. Great product
customer_reviews.author: M. Slee

customer_reviews.title: Turnkey projector!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for a 10 year old projector that always struggled to find the laptop or whatever. Not this one...it fires right up and finds the laptop and we were in business in no time! Good lightweight machine!!
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Only used it once but so far so good.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is BRIGHT. Small, light and portable. Does get hot, but you expect that from a projector. Only used it once but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Frame

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, compact, portable, 16:9
customer_reviews.text: Great projector - high 16:9 resolution. Very compact and powerful.
customer_reviews.author: OregonDean

customer_reviews.title: Really Love It
customer_reviews.text: This is even better than the last one I had. Great viewing for my participants.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Grinstead

customer_reviews.title: Optoma X304M XGA
customer_reviews.text: The projector works great. It is meeting the need for which it was purchased. The instructions for use and clear and easy to follow..
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Surpassed All Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Has surpassed all expectations. Small form factor. Very light. Great wide screen resolution. Using this exclusively web and other presentations and it's been great.
customer_reviews.author: LAW

customer_reviews.text: I was a previous Optoma projector owner and am satisfied with the quality of the device because of the high lumens and great picture quality.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This projector is wonderful. The light is so bright I can show movies in day light. I connect my iPad to it effortlessly and I am off! I love the size and weight. I had an older Optima, so I stuck with this brand. I am so glad I did.

customer_reviews.title: Good travel projector for conferences.
customer_reviews.text: Used it as a projector for our international conference and it worked great over a 3 day time period. Very lightweight, robust, great picture.

customer_reviews.title: Terrific portable projector!
customer_reviews.text: Great product that arrived on time and exceeded our expectations! It's portable yet projects well in most business settings - we're incredibly happy with it!

product_meta.title: Optoma X304M XGA 3000 Lumen Full 3D Portable DLP Projector with HDMI
product_meta.description:
Style:3000 Lumens WXGA

OPTOMA X304M, XGA, 3000 ANSI LUMENS, 3D-CAPABLE MOBILE MULTIMEDIA PROJECTOR
View Larger The Optoma X304M data projector is the perfect choice for mobile professionals looking for a powerful, yet compact projector capable of delivering stunning presentations on the go. This DLP projector's 3000 ANSI lumens and 10,000:1 contrast ratio provide the brightness level and definition you need to make your presentations stand out.

The Optoma X304M DLP projector offers the level of connectivity necessary to satisfy both your current and future projection needs. An intuitive menu system makes this data projector incredibly easy to operate. Designed for road warriors, the X304M 3D projector is small, lightweight, and reliable. The DLP light engine ensures that your data projector will deliver the same outstanding performance year after year.

AT A GLANCE:
 * Ideal for on-the-road professionals
 * HDMI connectivity for maximum compatibility
 * Fully 3D capable for the most amazing and immersive viewing experience
 * Advanced energy saving features to reduce the cost of operation
 * Easy to operate

View Larger READY WHEN YOU ARE
The X304M 3D projector is designed for quick and easy set up for mobile professionals with little time to spare. With a variety of connectivity options including HDMI, VGA, USB-B, Composite Video, and more, this data projector is ready for excellence whenever you are.

The HDMI port allows this DLP projector to connect readily to the broadest possible range of devices, including laptop computers, tablet computers, smartphones, Blu-ray and DVD players, and gaming consoles. An included IR remote control with mouse control makes presentations easier than ever.

Weighing in at just 3.3 pounds and measuring a compact 8.66" x 2.79" x 7.0", the X304M WXGA data projector is perfect for any business application.

STATE-OF-THE-ART DLP TECHNOLOGY
Projectors with Texas Instrument's DLP with BrilliantColor technology feature multi-color processing to produce accurate and vibrant colors on the screen. The Optoma X304M multi-color processing system features a six-segment color wheel coated with an advanced material that achieves superb color saturation and accuracy for extraordinary image quality. In addition, incredibly high native contrast ratios ensure clean and crisp black and white to ensure that text and charts are easy to read.

View Larger GREEN BY DESIGN
The X304M has been designed and manufactured to:

 * Use less than one-watt power consumption in standby mode-Up to 75 percent savings compared to regular standby mode
 * Limit energy use, with automatic shut down and remote management and control
 * Employ long-life materials and components
 * Use components that are lead-free on all printed circuit boards
 * Use no polystyrene foam in the packing materials
 * Comply with RoHS standards to phase out the use of hazardous materials

WHAT'S IN THE BOX?
This package includes the Optoma X304M, XGA, 3000 ANSI Lumens, 3D-Capable Mobile Multimedia Projector, AC Power Cord, VGA-to-VGA Cable, Remote Control, Batteries for Remote, Lens Cap, Multilingual CD-ROM User's Manual, and Quick Start Card.
